title: Looking for the typeface Pollen, designed by Brazilian type designer Eduardo Berliner
content:
hello everyone.  
I’m looking for pollen type designed by the brazilian designer eduardo berliner.  
Do you know where I can find it?  
thanks a lot

ciao

henri from Nantes

 [‹ WTF? font id](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204124321/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46027 "Go to previous forum topic") [Mona LIsa Smile ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204124321/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45928 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jordicolomer

comments.content: I don’t have a clue on where to get a hold of the actual font but (as you probably already know) [here’s a speciment of Pollen](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204124321/http:/www.personal.rdg.ac.uk/~lts98gl/MATD/Pollen_specimen.pdf).

yes it’s the only document I found on the net.  
thank you very much

henri,

i have forwarded your request to eduardo... he should get in touch with you.

best,  
- gustavo.

thank you very much gustavo.  
You can tell him that it’s for an artist book, a kind of big monographic catalog.  
If you want to see what he’s doing just write jordi colomer in google and you’ll find many things. I’m new here but I think it’s the begining of a long story.

best  
henri

Hello gustavo and henri,

I’m looking for the Pollen font as well. IS it possible to get in contact with Eduardo Berliner?

I saw that you, gustavo, are in contact with eduardo.

Could you ask him to mail me as well?

Greetings,  
Rob.

To anyone that can help on this board,

I’m also trying to get hold of Pollen as a gift for my wife. Does anybody know how to get hold of Eduardo?
